title: Online Collaborative Learning and Technology Utilization Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Course where learners composed of current practitioners engage in online collaborative projects using diverse personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Students can create team project proposals using online collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Miro).
Students can improve digital content by over 80% based on peer feedback.
Students can achieve over 90% team assignment completion rates by applying learner motivation strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
